title: Bankruptcy Auction of 2015 Nissan NV200 in Woodland, California
item_description:
Bankruptcy Auction of 2015 Nissan NV200 in Woodland, California- No Buyer's Premium!

Specifications

  • Year: 2015
  • Make: Nissan
  • Model: NV200
  • VIN: 3N6CM0KN8FK693523
  • License: 76103X1
    • Registration Expiration: 9/30/2025
  • Odometer Reads: 105,656
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 2,535
  • Engine: 2.0L L4
  • Body Style: Van
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 18.5/60R15C

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: White
  • Doors: Five Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Cloth
  • Interior Color: Charcoal

Note: Application for Replacement Title, Transfer Form, and Court Order will be mailed once 1. the court order is received and 2. the paperwork has been signed by the bankruptcy trustee. Please allow several weeks after the removal, 3-4 weeks. Thank you for your patience. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of smog, registration, transfer, sales tax, and fees due to the DMV.
